title: This J.Crew Cashmere Sale Rarely Happens—These Gorgeous Styles Are Up to 50% Off
excerpt: This J.Crew Cashmere Sale Rarely Happens—These Gorgeous Styles Are Up to 50% Off
text: J.Crew doesn't put its beautiful cashmere pieces on sale very often. It's typically just a few times per year. Well, now is one of those major moments. That's right, you can take up to 50% off cashmere (prices as marked) through January 9.Below I rounded up the gorgeous J.Crew cashmere silhouettes I think you'll absolutely love. Keep scrolling to shop stunning V-neck styles, accessories, brushed cashmere options, cute cardigans, and more. But you better act fast, many of the favorites are already selling out. J.Crew Featherweight Cashmere Pointelle Shrunken Cardigan Sweater You can style this featherweight cashmere cardigan with so many different outfits. J.Crew Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater in Stripe A striped sweater is an essential. j. crew Cashmere Patch-Pocket Cardigan This cardigan comes in a few great colors. J.Crew Ribbed Cashmere Cropped Crewneck Sweater A ribbed crewneck sweater is so chic. J.Crew Cashmere-Blend Trouser Socks These popular socks are on sale! J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Cropped V-Neck Sweater The brushed fabric is gorgeous. J.Crew Cashmere Fringe-Trim Sweater Lady Jacket J.Crew Cashmere Relaxed Cropped V-Neck Sweater J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Beanie J.Crew Featherweight Cashmere Shrunken Cardigan Sweater in Leopard Print Leopard continues to have such a moment. J.Crew Spring Street Cashmere Oversized Cardigan Sweater J.Crew Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves Cashmere tech gloves? Done. J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Sailor-Collar Sweater J.Crew Cashmere Shrunken T-Shirt A cashmere tee is dreamy. J.Crew Cashmere Cable-Knit Sweater-Vest So cute with a white tee. J.Crew Brushed Cashmere Shrunken Cable-Knit Crewneck Sweater And one more stunning brushed sweater to round out the list. Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent over seven years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises. He has also worked across a variety of other media brands and fashion retailers like Refinery29, PureWow, Men's Health, and Gilt covering commerce, trend reporting, women's and men's fashion, home, and lifestyle.
html:
J.Crew doesn't put its beautiful cashmere pieces on sale very often. It's typically just a few times per year. Well, now is one of those major moments. That's right, you can take up to 50% off cashmere (prices as marked) through January 9.

Below I rounded up the gorgeous J.Crew cashmere silhouettes I think you'll absolutely love. Keep scrolling to shop stunning V-neck styles, accessories, brushed cashmere options, cute cardigans, and more. But you better act fast, many of the favorites are already selling out.

J.Crew

Featherweight Cashmere Pointelle Shrunken Cardigan Sweater

You can style this featherweight cashmere cardigan with so many different outfits.

J.Crew

Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater in Stripe

A striped sweater is an essential.

j. crew

Cashmere Patch-Pocket Cardigan

This cardigan comes in a few great colors.

J.Crew

Ribbed Cashmere Cropped Crewneck Sweater

A ribbed crewneck sweater is so chic.

J.Crew

Cashmere-Blend Trouser Socks

These popular socks are on sale!

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Cropped V-Neck Sweater

The brushed fabric is gorgeous.

J.Crew

Cashmere Fringe-Trim Sweater Lady Jacket

J.Crew

Cashmere Relaxed Cropped V-Neck Sweater

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Beanie

J.Crew

Featherweight Cashmere Shrunken Cardigan Sweater in Leopard Print

Leopard continues to have such a moment.

J.Crew

Spring Street Cashmere Oversized Cardigan Sweater

J.Crew

Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves

Cashmere tech gloves? Done.

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Sailor-Collar Sweater

J.Crew

Cashmere Shrunken T-Shirt

A cashmere tee is dreamy.

J.Crew

Cashmere Cable-Knit Sweater-Vest

So cute with a white tee.

J.Crew

Brushed Cashmere Shrunken Cable-Knit Crewneck Sweater

And one more stunning brushed sweater to round out the list.

Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent over seven years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises. He has also worked across a variety of other media brands and fashion retailers like Refinery29, PureWow, Men's Health, and Gilt covering commerce, trend reporting, women's and men's fashion, home, and lifestyle.
